transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Mr. Dev Mittal ji.
Customer: Ha sir good evening yes baat kar raha hu. 
Executive: Sir good evening sir. 
Customer: Sir abhi to ek tender dekha humne by lead mein. 
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Usko apply kaise karna hai sir tender ko?
Executive: Okay main aapko bata deta hu sir. Sir India mart pe jo hai na tender ka sirf aapko na detail dikhta hai. 
Customer: Ha wo dikhta wo sab dekh liya maine view bhi dekh liya sab kuch dekh liya.
Executive: Sir aap na government ke portal pe jaake aap na portal ka naam hai GEM gem. 
Customer: Ha gem portal theek hai ha. 
Executive: Ha ji aapki portal agar gem portal hai aap usi tender ko search kijiye aur waha pe se fill kar sakte hai aap usko. 
Customer: Usi tender mein kon sa wo reference hai kuch iska?
Executive: Sir jo aapne contact details vagera li hongi aapko area vagera ka sector vagera mila hoga aur usme tender number mila hua hoga to aap gem portal pe bhi usko search kar sakte hai. 
Customer: [inaudible] aapko gem portal pe search karna padega wo aur waha pe wo tender dikh jayega. Fir waha pe pura pdf vagera jo aapne banaya usko submit karna padega. 
Customer: Accha theek hai theek hai. 
Executive: Ji okay. 
Customer: Baki kuch reference hota hai main aapko ek baar na whatsapp kar deta hu aapke personal number pe aap waha se dekh lijiyega ki baki party kaise bharti hai na. 
Customer: Theek hai ye number pe karega na jo abhi baat ho raha hai. 
Executive: Nahi nahi sir ye mera number nahi hai main apne personal number se aapko kar raha hu ye India mart ka wo calling number hai main apna number aapko batau ya aapko whatsapp kar du seedha. 
Customer: Ha ha theek hai sir. 
Executive: Main aapko kar raha hu sir personally kar raha hu okay. 
Customer: Mujhe whatsapp kar lena okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know how to apply for tender.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process of applying for tender.

- Executive offered to share reference via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share reference via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, buyleads, gem portal, whatsapp
